patthana21.38:1.1: Nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.38:2.1: Naahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:3.1: (Nasahetukanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.38:5.1: (Nahetusampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ sahetukadukasadisaṃ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
